comment: На этом барке Иремерисс должна ударить Тазарру - та падает на колено или замирает в испуганной позе

languages.text: "Дракон Маражай, ты знаешь, чем грозит повторение этого... недоразумения. Сделай выводы".
"Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."
languages.original_text: "Дракон Маражай, ты знаешь, чем грозит повторение этого... недоразумения. Сделай выводы".

traits.locale_text: "Mukdah! Ta sooil agam nax dragan Marajai faigh!"
"Mukdah! Ta sooil agam nax dragan Marajai faigh!"
"Mukdah! Ta sooil agam nax dragan Marajai faigh!"
"Mukdah! Ta sooil agam nax dragan Marajai faigh!"
"Draсon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."
"Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."

languages.text: 「ドラコン・マラズハイ、この誤解を…繰り返す危険性は理解しているな。自分の答えを導き出せ」
languages.original_text: "Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."

traits.locale_text: 「ドラコン・マラズハイ、この誤解を…繰り返す危険性は理解しているな。自分の答えを導き出せ」

languages.text: “玛拉斋裁决官，如果继续重复这种……误解的话，你知道后果有多危险。你自己动动脑子，得出结论吧。”
languages.original_text: "Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."

traits.locale_text: “玛拉斋裁决官，如果继续重复这种……误解的话，你知道后果有多危险。你自己动动脑子，得出结论吧。”

languages.text: « Dracon Marazhai, vous n'ignorez pas les dangers de répéter ce petit... malentendu. Je vous invite donc à tirer vos propres conclusions. »
languages.original_text: "Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."

traits.locale_text: « Dracon Marazhai, vous n'ignorez pas les dangers de répéter ce petit... malentendu. Je vous invite donc à tirer vos propres conclusions. »

languages.text: «Dracón Marazhai, conoces bien el peligro de repetir este... malentendido. Saca tus propias conclusiones».
languages.original_text: "Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."

traits.locale_text: «Dracón Marazhai, conoces bien el peligro de repetir este... malentendido. Saca tus propias conclusiones».

languages.text: "Dracon Marazhai, Ihr wisst, welche Gefahr eine Wiederholung dieses ... Missverständnisses birgt. Zieht Eure eigenen Schlüsse."
languages.original_text: "Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."

traits.locale_text: "Dracon Marazhai, Ihr wisst, welche Gefahr eine Wiederholung dieses ... Missverständnisses birgt. Zieht Eure eigenen Schlüsse."

languages.text: "Dracon Marazhai, bu... Yanlış anlamayı tekrarlamanın tehlikelerinin farkındasındır. Kendi çıkarımlarını kendin yap."
languages.original_text: "Dracon Marazhai, you know the danger of repeating this... misunderstanding. Draw your own conclusions."

traits.locale_text: "Dracon Marazhai, bu... Yanlış anlamayı tekrarlamanın tehlikelerinin farkındasındır. Kendi çıkarımlarını kendin yap."
